android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: Status of Town/Village (e.g LGA HQ, D/HQ, V/HQ, Ward e.t.c)

TextView.android:text: Is/Was any members of the Community in any of the following conditions (if not then fill with NA):
When was your community attacked by the insurgent?
How many time did insurgents attacked your community?
Have you lost any member of the Community due to Insurgent Attacks? (if yes indicate the number lost, if no type NA)
If type of Facility above is d, e, or f)

Use the keywords below the blank spaces: 
Available (In Good Condition) 
Available (Partly Damaged)

Not Available 
Functional

No NGOs or CBOs
Have there been any destruction of livelihood in the Community?

android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: If yes, what's the major cause. If No just type No

TextView.android:text: How many times did the insurgent attack your Community?
What was the major impact of the insurgent in your community?

android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: Where did the people go after being displaced?
For How long has the community been under Boko Haram insurgency? (Month)
When did the people return to the community(Month, Year)

TextView.android:text: Have some members of the community lost some of their belongings in their household due to the insurgency?

android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: If Yes, Specify (Item lost and Estimated Cost) If No write NIL

TextView.android:text: What is the general Socio-Economic Condition in the community?
Have people in the community relocated as a result of the Boko Haram Insurgency?

android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: If Yes, estimate how many people. If No write NIL

TextView.android:text: Was there any people/family in your community that did not relocated as a result of the Boko Haram Insurgency?

android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: If Yes, estimate how many people. If No write NIL

TextView.android:text: How has been the livelihood condition of those who remained in the community during the Boko Haram Insurgency?

android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: Poor, Good or Very Good (NIL if not Applicable)

TextView.android:text: Has any person that relocated as a result of the Boko Haram insurgency returned to the community?

android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: If Yes, estimate how many people returned. If No write NILL
How has been the livelihood condition of the returnees to the community: Poor, Good or Very Good (NIL if not Applicable)

TextView.android:text: Have the returnee started adjusting or reactivation of thier livelihood?
Have the returnees come with new means of livelihood to the community?

android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: If Yes, Indicate the new means. If No write NILL

TextView.android:text: What has been responsible for the inability of the returnees/community to get back to the livelihood that have not been picked up again?
What are the necessary things (Need) required to get the community to overcome the challenges to get back to these livelihood?
What are the major challeges and threats to effective rebuilding of the community?
What are the major cultural barriers to the reconstruction process in your community?
Is there any reconstructions work in your community?

android.support.design.widget.TextInputE.android:hint: If Yes, Indicate. If No write NILL

TextView.android:text: What type of agency and stage of reconstruction projects had been carried out?
What other assistance is the returnee community getting?
Are these assistance adequate to guarantee basic standard of living? Answer with, Yes or No
How long does the organizations rendering assistance to the returnee community plan to offer the assistance to community? (Months)
What specific intervention may be relevant to your community?
What do you think can make your community sustainable?
